subdisciplines.name: Language and Gender
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between language and gender, including the social construction of gender through language.

subdisciplines.name: Language and Power
subdisciplines.description: The study of the ways in which language is used to establish and reinforce power relationships in society.

subdisciplines.name: Multilingualism
subdisciplines.description: The study of the use and acquisition of multiple languages, including the social and cultural factors that influence multilingual behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Language and Identity
subdisciplines.description: The study of the ways in which language use reflects and constructs personal and social identity.
